refsection.title: Example test
refsection.para: An example of how tests should be structured

refsection.title: Test environment and setup
refsection.para:
Automated testing isn't possible. To make things easier, we have code snippets which can be copied exactly, to get the required result.
cp /lib/systemd/system/{graphical,focussed}.target systemctl start boot-manager.target

refsection.title: Test Overview
refsection.para:
A broad explanation of the different test cases in the scenario, i.e.
Add a shutdown client Tell the shutdown client to shut down

refsection.title: Test steps
refsection.para:
Add a shutdown client
/usr/local/lib/boot-manager-1/legacy-app-handler -u cups.service -m 1 Check the DLT log for appropriate output
Tell the shutdown client to shut down
kill -HUP $(pidof nsm-dummy) Check the DLT log for appropriate output
